page.title: 06A Ladock Mother's Day.8.7.85
page.content:
My Mother got up at 7.00 am. She gave us all our{breakfast}at 8.00 am and then took us to school in time for 9.00 am. When she got home she{washed some{clothes}and then{cleaned the {house}until about 1.00 pm. She did have a short rest at 11.00 am when she had a cup of coffee.
After she had had her lunch she did some{ironing}(on some days she goes shopping after lunch in Truro). Today she went to the{shops}in Grampound Road before she collected us from school at 3.15 pm.
We had{tea}when we got home and then Mum went to{feed the chickens and milk {the cows.}At about 8.00 pm she got us ready for bed. She then{watched T.V. until she went to{bed}at about 10.30 pm.
